name: Snow White by Fairytale Studios - Free
name_original: Snow White by Fairytale Studios - Free
description:
If the Grimm Brothers were to make an interactive app of Snow White, this would be it!

With enchanting illustrations moving with the physics of your iPhones and iPads, the story comes to life before your eyes. Completely interactive, explore and immerse yourself in the world of Snow White, the Dwarves, the Evil Queen and even the Huntsman!

✔ iPhone 5 fully supported and plays fabulously on every sized screen!

✔ Read to Me!
- Great for kids and adults who enjoy being read to! Feel free to choose between a Male or Female voice! The story will be read to you as you interact with the animations and explore across the kingdom of Snow White! Take your time with each scene and enjoy! This option is great for Parents who can take a break from all the reading!

✔ Explore!
- Each page has a tremendous amount of interactive content. We wanted to create a completely interactive and immersive experience, helping the story come to life. Try touching everything you see on the screen! Also, many of the scenes have hidden objects that roll and move as you move the device!

✔ Enjoy the Storybook animations!
- The Grimm Brothers didn't know about cartoons when they wrote Snow White so even though we all know the story through the animated movies, we set out to create an actual storybook feel like the original illustrated books. At Fairytale Studios, we look to recreate the authors original vision of these classic tales. But don't get us wrong, we love cartoons too! Everything you see is hand drawn by our fantastic crew of artists and designers.

✔ Physics!
- Now, in almost every scene, we have added additional layers of gameplay. When you move your device, look to see what happens! Can you find all the secrets?

✔ What reviewers and parents are saying:

-"This is one of the best apps we have ever downloaded!”

-“A really great app for kids of all ages as it has various interactive activities and improves their memory!”

-"One of the finest interactive book apps out there, love the physics and interactivity"

✔ No Ads or annoying Pop-Ups! Upgrade to the Full Version to experience additional scenes and gameplay!

✔For additional content and a complete game, please support us and check out the complete version of Snow White!

We hope you enjoy Snow White and if you have any questions, suggestions or feedback please feel free to let us know anytime at CustomerService@Fairytale-Studios.com
